attributes.action: Enact legislation mandating the inclusion of salary information in job postings.
attributes.additional_details: Job seekers want salary transparency laws to ensure fairness, close pay gaps, and improve negotiations. It saves time by aligning expectations, fosters trust, holds employers accountable, and reflects global trends. Transparent salaries also empower candidates and boost equity.
attributes.background: We want the government to mandate that all job postings include salary information, ensuring transparency, fairness, and accountability in the hiring process.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700482
